Q_DESC: Create a program that asks the user to enter their name and their age. Print out a message addressed to them that tells them the year  they will turn 100 years old.
TESTCASE_1:
Ram
30
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Ram will be 100 years old in 2087
TESTCASE_2:

35
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Dhoni will be 100 years old in 2082

TESTCASE_4:
